title: Tablet Fragment
summaries: The Tablet Fragment is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist pet-summoning item that spawns a Phantasmal Dragon pet to follow the player around. The pet resembles the Phantasm Dragon spawned during the Lunatic Cultist's battle, and the only difference between the two is that the pet itself is smaller. The Tablet Fragment has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Lunatic Cultist in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a baby phantasmal dragon
